reviewText: If you like Kochikame, Ryotsu or funny stuff then look no further then this DVD. Vol 3 selection like the others contain 4 episodes that in same way shape or form end up making you laugh while introducing more characters into the series. In this DVD Kaipan, Dolphin, Shiratori, and the old man inventor(can't remember his name) are all introduced. There is also a really funny episode about how why the police station itself isn't a character and what that would be like if it was (:
